alert.note: Alert for Dallam; Hartley; Moore; Oldham; Sherman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 02 at 10:23PM CDT until October 02 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Oldham County in the Panhandle of Texas... Western Sherman County in the Panhandle of Texas... Dallam County in the Panhandle of Texas... Western Moore County in the Panhandle of Texas... Hartley County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 1130 PM CDT. * At 1023 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 14 miles north of Ware to near Romero, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. * Locations impacted include... Dumas, Dalhart, Stratford, Hartley, Cactus, Channing, Ware, Four Way, Conlen, and Romero. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
